name: e-Shape Room
description:
An arcade-style game about platforming and shooting shapes! Kill shapes to earn points in an endless arena that slowly shrinks as you play. Killing shapes temporarily grows the room's size. 

Originally made as an attempt for the Indi Tales game jam, the theme being "One Room", but wasn't finished in time. I decided to finish it anyway and here is the result.

The game will be downloaded as a zip file, simply extract the file and run the unity executable.

Criticism and feedback welcome!

Music was made using ecrett, an online AI royalty-free music creation website.
